reference.title: cxxClass module
reference.shortdesc: Defines a top-level container for all the elements necessary to describe an C++ API class.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxClass> topic type contains elements necessary to show the name of the class, the short description of the class, the class syntax, and the class use description. This topic type module also contains all the elements necessary to describe the component variables and functions.
To describe the component fields and methods insert cxxFunction, cxxDefine, cxxVariable, cxxEnumeration or cxxTypedef elements into the cxxClass module.
